SearchStockerCommonCodeList.MainSQL: SELECT DISTINCT E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE AS Code, CASE WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = '9' THEN 'PRE AGING STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = '4' THEN 'HIGH AGING STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = '3' THEN 'NORM AGING STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = '7' THEN 'SHIP AGING STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'E' THEN '2nd Empty STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = '1' THEN 'CDC STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'J' THEN 'JIG STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'LWW' THEN 'LAMI WAIT STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'NPW' THEN 'NND PROD STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'NWW' THEN 'NND WAIT STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'FWW' THEN 'FOIL WAIT STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'JRW' THEN 'JUMBO ROLL STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'PCW' THEN 'PROD COMP STO' WHEN E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = 'PLT' THEN 'CELL PALLET STO' ELSE 'ETC' END AS Sto_Desc FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST E INNER JOIN TB_EGN_FCTRY_AREA_MST TEFAM ON TEFAM.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE AND E.FACTORY_AREA_ID = TEFAM.FACTORY_AREA_ID WHERE E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = :AREA_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID = 'STO' AND E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE IS NOT NULL
